body_html:
Any updates for this? I test the code by @alalbiol and the run time results are shown as below:

normal conv2d 0.3061046600341797ms native time 0.29351091384887695ms scan time 1.5845508575439453ms

Was running on tensorflow version 1.13.0-dev20181017 on GTX 1080 TI, cuda 9.0, cudnn 7.

body:
Any updates for this? I test the code by @alalbiol and the run time results are shown as below:

`normal conv2d 0.3061046600341797ms native time 0.29351091384887695ms scan time 1.5845508575439453ms`

Was running on tensorflow version 1.13.0-dev20181017 on GTX 1080 TI, cuda 9.0, cudnn 7.
